summary: Comprehensive testing of Commercial Documents Module and Services Marketplace features. All 20 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing confirmed all features working correctly.
seed_data_creation: Test partners, quotes, invoices, and contracts created during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Commercial Documents Module and Services Marketplace features are working. Document numbering follows YMP-TYPE-YYYY-NNN format (e.g., YMP-DEV-2026-001 for quotes, YMP-FAC-2026-001 for invoices, YMP-CTR-2026-001 for contracts). PDF generation works correctly with ReportLab.

commercial_quotes.POST /api/commercial/quotes: PASS - Creates quote with YMP-DEV-YYYY-NNN numbering

product_seo.Product form SEO tab: PASS - Has Meta Title and Meta Description fields with Google preview

ui_verification.services_page: 10 category buttons displayed, search input working, provider cards shown
ui_verification.admin_dashboard: Gestion Commerciale menu visible, all stats displayed
ui_verification.commercial_dashboard: All tabs working (Vue d'ensemble, Partenaires, Devis, Factures, Contrats)
ui_verification.pdf_download: PDF files download correctly with proper naming (Devis_YMP-DEV-2026-003.pdf)
ui_verification.product_form: SEO tab with Meta Title, Meta Description, and Google preview
